name: Dark Tapastic
description:
The best (and also the only :P) Dark skin for Tapastic!

I also make music! Check it out: https://soundcloud.com/guitarjorge24

Let me know if you encounter any issues. You can report an issue here or contact me on http://typhlosion24.deviantart.com/art/Tapastic-Dark-Skin-Theme-561791245
